Class QuestionManager

java.lang.Object
  QuestionManager

public class QuestionManager
extends java.lang.Object

QuestionManager reads and displays finance based questions from a text file. The questions can be displayed from items or at certain points in the level.

Author:
John Kim, Tanner Lai, Raymond Zhao

Constructor Summary
QuestionManager()
          Constructions the question manager to read the questions, answers, and select a random question to ask

          This draws the question display at the bottom left corner of the screen

getAnswer

public int getAnswer()
Returns the answer to the current question

Returns:
1:A, 2:B, 3:C, 4:D, -1 if there's an error
